message_content:
Dear Manager Xu,  

I am Lei Mingxuan. Regarding my loan application, I have supplemented the profit forecast basis for the Hangzhou pop-up store and the explanation of my family's home replacement plan as requested. The relevant documents have been sent to you via WeChat. Please check them at your convenience. If you have any questions or require further materials, please feel free to contact me.

Jing, I saw the newly released 'Stellar Explorer' series at the Raffles City North Bund. The mecha model's design and paint job are really impressive—the actual product looks even cooler than the official images. I took some photos and shared them in the group chat. What do you think?

Physical objects are indeed possible! How about the joint mobility? I noticed in the official images that new materials were used this time—how does it feel? I'm a bit tempted, but I'm afraid it might be another case of "official images looking infinitely better."

Weige, I'm on my way back from Hongkou, but the evening rush hour plus the rain has caused a terrible traffic jam. I should be able to get to the restaurant around 7:30 for dinner. Let me know before you head out.

Me: Brother Wei, I just closed the shop and am leaving from Hangtou now. With the evening rush hour and rain, there might be some traffic. If you arrive first, go ahead and order the dishes. Don't wait for me.
Lin Wei: Honey, are you home yet? You must be exhausted after running around all day. Did you get all the loan materials sorted out? Get some rest early.
Dad, Mom, I've already arrived at the restaurant. The private room number is 'Spring Blossoms'. About what time will you be arriving?

Mom, Dad and I have finished viewing the apartments, and the process went quite smoothly. We're quite interested in one of them. Please don't cook dinner; we'll either eat out or have something simple tonight.
Mom, I've finished my rehabilitation exercises, and the porridge for breakfast was delicious. My ankle feels a bit better than yesterday, and I'll be careful in the afternoon, so don't worry.

Xiao Zhang, regarding the custom-made trench coat that our regular customer Qian Duoduo inquired about on WeChat earlier, I have forwarded the fabric and size requirements to you. Please coordinate the details directly with her and provide a quotation as soon as possible.

Ms. Qian, I have asked our staff member Xiao Zhang to add you on WeChat regarding the custom trench coat you requested. He will confirm all the details with you and provide a quote. Please feel free to communicate any requirements directly with him.
Weige, are you free tonight? My ankle has recovered quite well, and I'd like to celebrate. How about that Xinjiang restaurant, Hoxa Bistro, on the Bund? Shall we meet at 6:30?

【China Mobile】Dear customer, you have used 80% of the data in your current plan. To avoid exceeding the limit, we recommend subscribing to the 10 yuan 5GB data top-up package. Reply "Yes" to subscribe.
Went roller skating on Langu Road this afternoon. My ankle felt okay, and I skated for 20 minutes. Consider it the first step in my recovery!
Xiao Zhang, I've arrived at the hospital and will be at the store around 10 o'clock. Please start unpacking the batch of autumn jackets that arrived yesterday, and I'll check them when I get there.

Manager Zheng, it was a pleasure chatting with you earlier. I'll refine the autumn promotion plan over the next couple of days and send it to you for review. Also, the doctor said my ankle is recovering well—thank you for your concern!
You're too kind, Boss Lei! There's no rush for the proposal; please focus on getting well first. I'll notify you as soon as there's any news from the mall.
Mom, the doctor said my foot is recovering well and I can start moving around slowly, so don't worry. I'll come home for dinner tonight and I'd love to have some of the soup you make.

Brother Li, I'll take on the role of referee for the billiards tournament next week. Could you please send me the specific time, location, and list of participants so I can familiarize myself with them in advance?

Manager Xu, I have received the report for August. Thank you. I have reviewed the holdings and have a few questions I'd like to discuss. The online meeting at 3 PM the day after tomorrow works for me, and we can go into more detail then.
Mom, I just left the store, and the traffic is a bit heavy. I'll be home in about half an hour.

Master He, thank you for the phone consultation this morning. When it's convenient, could you please send me the regular maintenance item lists and estimated costs for the Tesla Model Y and NIO ES6? I would like to make a detailed comparison. Thank you!
【China Mobile】Dear customer, your current phone bill account balance is 58.76 yuan. To ensure normal usage, it is recommended to recharge promptly. Click http://10086.cn for quick recharge.

Brother Feng, I've received the August monthly report and noted the drawdown situation of the technology fund. Regarding the follow-up strategy, let's discuss it over video call tomorrow evening. I'm generally available after 8 PM on my end. Would that work for you?

Minmin, I've reviewed the supply list and insurance details for western Sichuan—they're very thorough! I'll pick up some high-altitude medication and a few high-capacity power banks this weekend. Is there anything else I should pay special attention to?

Xiao Zhang, today's sales have been tallied and the cash has been placed in the safe. Please remember to lock the doors and windows, and turn off the water and electricity after cleaning. Thank you for your hard work.

Zhou Tao, I have verified the payment settlement statement for this week. The total amount is 12,850 yuan, and the detailed breakdown has been sent to your email. Please review and confirm. If everything is in order, I will arrange the payment for tomorrow.
Mom, I'm home. I brought some porridge and steamed buns for dinner. I've sorted out all the accounts at the shop today. I'm a bit tired, but it feels quite fulfilling.

Dad, I've shortlisted over ten properties near the inner ring of Pudong and shared the links in the family group. There's one near Yuanshen Sports Center that Mom seems to like quite a bit. How about we prioritize checking that one out this weekend?

【Lianjia】Dear Mr. Lei, a new 102-square-meter three-bedroom apartment has been listed in the "Shengshi Nianhua" community in the Yuanshen area of Pudong New District, with an asking price of 8.5 million yuan. Click the link for details: https://lianjia.com/xxxx

Mom, I'll check the property we're going to view this weekend as soon as I get to the shop in the morning. I'll note down key details like the building's age, property management fees, and nearby schools, and make sure to clarify everything with the agent. Don't worry, Dad and you. I'll also plan the route in advance.
Me: Master He, my car made some unusual noises when I drove it this afternoon. Would you be available to check it for me tomorrow morning? I plan to drive over around 10 o'clock.

Zhao Min: Mingxuan, have you checked out the link I shared in the group for the self-driving equipment list for Western Sichuan? Items like a windbreaker, sleeping bag, and altitude sickness medicine are essential. Do you think there’s anything else we need to add?
Wang Xiuying: Son, what would you like for dinner? Your dad said he wants braised pork, and I'll stir-fry two vegetable dishes as well.
Mom, I'm heading out. We'll talk in detail about those houses when I get back tonight, and I'll keep you updated on the weekend trip plans.
Son, drive slowly on the road. We'll wait for you to come back for dinner tonight. Your dad said he wants to have a little drink.

Viagra, the stuff you shared in the group chat looks quite interesting. Are you free next week? Let’s grab a meal together—it’s been a while since we last met. We can catch up on how things have been going.

Xiao Zhang, I'll probably arrive at the store around 9:20. Please check the inventory of the new autumn clothes that arrived yesterday, iron and hang up the main recommended styles first, and also turn on the lights and music in advance.
Okay, Brother Lei, received. I'll check the inventory and ironing right away. The music and lighting systems are already turned on.
Ms. Qian, the trench coat you inquired about yesterday is now in stock. We have the beige color in size M that you wanted. Would you be available to come and try it on today?
Mom, I'm about to leave after finishing breakfast. Please be careful on your way to view the house today, and send me a message when you and Dad arrive.
Dad, I'm heading out to pick up Lin Wei. The car has been checked and everything's fine, so don't worry.
I'm on my way and will arrive at the entrance of your residential area in about 40 minutes. Are you ready?

【Moganshan Yucha Homestay】Dear Mr. Lei, the landscape room you reserved has been set aside for you. Check-in is available after 14:00. Homestay address: No. XX, XX Road, Moganshan Town, Deqing County. Contact number: 0572-12345678. We wish you a pleasant journey!
Mom, Vivian and I are hiking in Moganshan. The air here in the mountains is so fresh. You and Dad must be tired from house-hunting today. Get some rest early, and we'll talk more tomorrow.
Mom, Lin Wei and I have finished checking out the car. The NIO car feels pretty good, with plenty of space. We'll grab a simple bite to eat outside tonight, so no need to wait for us for dinner.

【NIO】Dear Mr. Lei, you have successfully scheduled an in-depth test drive of the NIO ES6. Your reservation number is NE202509071842. Your test drive consultant is Li Xiang, and the contact number is 400-999-9999. Please arrive at the NIO Center at No.1 Yaohan 10 minutes in advance.
Mom, I'm up. My ankle still feels a bit off. What's for breakfast?
Son, there's congee and steamed buns for breakfast. If your ankle is bothering you, walk slowly and don't rush.

【UF Clinic】Dear Mr. Lei, you have successfully scheduled a rehabilitation assessment for 2025-09-08 at 16:30, location: Jing'an Clinic. Please arrive 10 minutes in advance. If there are any changes, please call 021-12345678 in advance.
Manager Wang, the meeting minutes have been sorted out and sent to your email. Please check and confirm. We will proceed with the September "Early Autumn Outing" plan as discussed.
Mom, I just came out of the rehabilitation clinic. The doctor said I'm recovering well, but I need to rest for a few more days. I bought some fruits and pastries for tonight, and I'll be back soon.

Weiwei, I've sorted out the photos from Moganshan and sent them to you on WeChat. Especially the one in the bamboo forest—the lighting was absolutely perfect. Do you remember how long we spent finding the right angle?

Got it! Every photo looks amazing, especially the one with the bamboo forest—it feels like it could be a wallpaper. I really miss the mountain air and the breakfast at that guesthouse. How about we find another place to visit this weekend?
Dad, what time did you schedule with the agent to view the house tomorrow morning? I should be free at the shop in the morning and can go with you to take a look.
Viagra, I've confirmed the flight tickets and car rental orders for Western Sichuan. See you at the airport tomorrow. How's your packing going on your end?

Zhou Tao, good afternoon. Regarding the co-branded hoodie, the initial requirements are as follows: the main fabric is preferred to be 320g pure cotton fleece sweatshirt fabric, with colors leaning towards navy blue and oatmeal. A washed and vintage effect is required. Please help prepare fabric samples and initial quotes for these two colors and send them to my email. Additionally, if convenient, please also check if there are any retro checkered or striped fabrics suitable for patchwork. Thank you.

Mom, I'm home, and dinner smells delicious. I've packed everything for the Western Sichuan trip and brought all the medicine, so you and Dad don't need to worry. I'll follow the plan and do my rehabilitation exercises later—I won't slack off.

Zhou Tao: Brother Tao, I've sent the fabric samples and sampling schedule for the autumn collaboration hoodies to your email. We've tentatively set the initial order quantity at 500 pieces. Could you please review and let me know if there are any issues?
Mom, I'll be back for dinner tonight, and I'll also talk to Dad about the check-up on Saturday. I've been craving your braised pork and steamed perch all afternoon.

Dad, I'll accompany you to Renji Hospital for a hearing test at 9 AM on Saturday. The address is No. 160, Pujian Road. We'll leave home at 8:30 AM, and please remember to bring your medical insurance card.

Vivi, I've packed all my luggage and will set off for Western Sichuan tomorrow. After working out today, I met Zhang Wei and had dinner with my parents. I feel particularly at ease before the trip. I'll bring you a gift when I return!
Mom, Weiwei and I have decided to have a family dinner at home on Saturday evening to celebrate Dad taking his first step. I’ll take care of buying groceries and cooking. What would you like to eat?
Son, your dad said he wants to eat the braised pork and steamed sea bass you make. Just buy some fresh vegetables as you see fit. Thank you for your hard work!

【Western Sichuan Action Team】Team members, we will gather at 7:00 AM tomorrow at the parking lot of Gate 1 of Century Park. Please be punctual. The weather is clear, and road conditions are good. Everyone, please check your equipment. See you in Western Sichuan!
Received, will arrive on time. Equipment has been checked and is ready.

Zhou Tao, the modifications to the fabric and pocket design for the autumn collaborative hoodie, as discussed in the video conference, have been confirmed. The quotation has been received, with a minimum order quantity of 300 pieces per style and a production lead time of 25 days. We will sign the formal contract after I return from Western Sichuan.
Me: The performance was absolutely stunning! Macbeth pulled me into a small room and whispered to me—it gave me goosebumps! How was your experience? See you at the bar!
Lin Wei: I saw the sacrifice ceremony in Eden, the lighting and sound effects were amazing! I'm still at the usual spot in the bar, come quickly!
Today I accompanied my dad to look at hearing aids, and then took a client to see that apartment in Lianyang. Everything went quite smoothly. Are you free this weekend? Let's grab a drink and chat.
Mom, breakfast was delicious. I'm heading out to the pool hall and will be back in the evening. I remember Dad's hearing aid appointment—I'll let you know the scheduled time next week.
【NIO】Dear Mr. Lei, your scheduled ES6 test drive at 14:45 today has been confirmed. Please arrive at the Jinqiao Experience Center on time. For any questions, please call 400-999-9999.
Dongzi, how was my refereeing today? The photos turned out great, send me a copy. Let’s catch up for another game next time!
Weiwei, I just finished dinner with my friends from the court and am now taking a taxi over. I should arrive at the NIO Center entrance around 14:45. Have you arrived yet?
Viagra, I'm on the bus now and should arrive at the T2 departure level around 8:20. Where are you two?
Mom, I've arrived at the airport. The journey went smoothly. Please take care of yourselves at home and don't overwork.
Minmin, we have already checked in our luggage at Island D and are now heading towards the security checkpoint. Which security checkpoint are you near?

Mom, I've safely arrived at the hotel in Chengdu. The drive went smoothly, so you and Dad don't need to worry. The surroundings here are quite nice. I'll unpack my luggage and then head out for a meal.
Viagra, I'm all packed over here. What time are you and Minmin planning to arrive at the hotel? Let's meet in our room to go over tomorrow's itinerary and check our gear together.

Minmin, I've gone back to my room. I've checked the oxygen tanks and medicine for tomorrow, and everything is fine. Please double-check your warm clothing on your end. Get some rest early, and see you tomorrow!

Me: Weige, we've arrived at the Duodu River viewpoint. Parking here is really convenient, and the scenery is absolutely breathtaking! The river is rushing, prayer flags are fluttering in the wind, and there are snow-capped mountains in the distance. You two should hurry over. Let's take a walk along the riverbank and check out those Tibetan clothing shops while we're at it.

Me: Kai, I just got back from the UR store. The display of their autumn new arrivals is quite innovative, using a lot of layered shelves and lighting combinations. I think we could learn from it. Are you free to come to the store this afternoon to chat?
Zheng Kai: Received. I'll come over when I'm patrolling this afternoon, and we can also discuss the National Day activities.
Me: Jiejie, are you free this weekend? I'd like to invite you to my shop to help me select the styles for the next batch of autumn clothes. Your taste is better than mine. I'll treat you to milk tea!
Shen Jie: Sounds good, bro! I'll come over on Saturday afternoon. I actually need to buy a couple of new clothes anyway.

Mom, we arrived at Tagong Town today. The scenery is incredibly beautiful, and I'm doing fine, so you and Dad don't need to worry. It gets a bit chilly here at night, so please stay warm in Shanghai as well.

Good morning, Mom. I just finished shooting the sunrise and am heading back to the guesthouse for some Tibetan-style breakfast. The scenery here is absolutely stunning, and I've brought some small souvenirs for you and Dad. How are you both doing at home?

Dad, we'll have our last meal at the Tibetan village at noon and then set off back to Chengdu. The drive will take about five to six hours, and we'll arrive in the evening. The car and road conditions are both good, so don't worry.
Me: Brother Wei, Minmin, today's trip to Western Sichuan was totally worth it. When we get back to Shanghai, we must arrange a meal together as soon as possible to share the photos properly!
Mom, I've safely arrived at the hotel in Chengdu. I drove for over six hours today, so I'm a bit tired. My flight back to Shanghai is tomorrow at noon, and I probably won't be home until the evening.
Me: Vivi, I just finished washing up and I'm ready to video call you! Today, I saw an incredibly beautiful sunrise over a sea of clouds at Mount Siguniang, and I bought you a super warm wool scarf!
Lin Wei: Answer the video call quickly! I can't wait to see the scarf and hear your story. You must be exhausted after driving for so long. Get a good rest on the plane tomorrow.
Me: Weige, Minmin, I'm all packed. Let's meet in the lobby at 7:30. After checking out, we'll load the car and go straight to breakfast.
【Yunjing Hotel】Dear guest, you have successfully checked out. Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to welcoming you again.

【Shenzhou Car Rental】Dear Mr. Lei, your order (ending with 5678) has been settled, and the payment has been deducted from the pre-authorization. The vehicle inspection showed no abnormalities. Thank you for using our service!
Mom: Son, have you arrived in downtown Chengdu? Are you having fun? Remember to bring some local specialties for Weiwei and her parents.

Me: Brother Tao, I saw several brands at Taikoo Li that blend outdoor and urban styles. Their tailoring and fabrics are excellent, and I think we could draw inspiration from them for our next season's collaboration.
Zhou Tao: Received, Mingxuan. Which specific brand is it? If convenient, please take a few detailed photos and send them to me. I will also look for fabric resources on my end.
Me: Hello, driver. I'm already at the entrance of Chunxi Road Guangguang Square, heading to Terminal 2 of Shuangliu Airport. I have quite a bit of luggage, sorry for the trouble.

Me: Vivi, I've arrived at the airport and just finished checking in my luggage. I bought some low-sugar pastries for you and your parents. I'll give them to you when I get home tonight. The flight is scheduled to land at 19:30.
Lin Wei: Okay, Brother Xuan, have a safe trip. I just finished my work here, waiting for you to come back. No rush with the pastries, just stay safe.
Mom, I'm home. The wool scarf and pastries I brought back from the trip are on the table. I've also sorted out the photos and videos, and I'll show them to you and Dad tomorrow.
Mom, I've arrived at the store, and everything is going smoothly. Don't just make do with lunch on your own; I'll be back for dinner tonight.

Zhou Tao, I've just finished the inventory check. The out-of-stock list for the autumn new arrivals has been compiled, mainly for item numbers TC-2025-09A/B/C, which are out of stock in all colors and sizes. Please confirm the restocking time and price as soon as possible.
Zhou Tao: Received. The TC-2025-09 series is in sufficient stock, with the same price as last time. Shipment can be arranged this afternoon and is expected to arrive tomorrow afternoon.

Qianqian, I noticed you liked my WeChat Moments post. I just got back from a trip and have added many new autumn styles to the store. Feel free to drop by when you have time—I’ve saved a surprise for you.

Zhou Tao, regarding the restocking of the autumn collaboration collection, I need to add 20 pieces each of size M and size L for item number LC-2025-Collaboration-01. Please arrange accordingly and confirm the final shipping list.
Mom, I'm off work now and driving home. It'll take about 45 minutes to get back. The traffic is a bit heavy, so please go ahead and eat without waiting for me.
Dad, I'm home. Mom's fish smells so good, I could smell it from downstairs. I've sorted out all the travel photos and videos, and I'll show them to you during dinner.

Zhou Tao, good afternoon. Regarding the quotation for the materials of the 'Autumn Journey in the Wilderness' event, I have basically completed the copywriting framework. I expect to send you the first draft tonight. Would that be convenient for you to prepare in advance?
Mom, I've washed the dishes and tidied up the kitchen. The fish you made today was really delicious—thank you for all your hard work!
Chen Mo, Su Qing, I just created a group called 'Pudong Coffee Roaming' and added you both. We can share more about café explorations and brewing tips in the future. Welcome aboard!
【WeChat Red Packet】Wishing you prosperity and good fortune!
Vivi, everything went smoothly today. I feel great after my workout and even made some new friends. Let's have a good video chat over the weekend. Miss you.
Mom, I will accompany Dad to the hearing center tomorrow morning, so I might be home a bit later for lunch. Please don't wait for me.

Xiao Gu, I've checked today's sales data and everything is fine. I won't be at the store tomorrow, so please keep the spare key with you. If any packages arrive, could you help sign for them? Thanks for your hard work.
Mom, I just finished training and I'm heading to the supermarket to pick up a few things. I remember you wanted blueberries, so I'll get those. I should be home in about 20 minutes.

Dad, I'll drive you home. You can rest in the car for a while. The testing went smoothly today, and you're satisfied with the hearing aid's performance. We'll discuss with Mom tonight to decide on the specific model.
Xiao Gu, I will arrive at the store around 11:30. Please organize the sales slips from the morning and compile the customer inquiries from online consultations. I will handle them when I arrive.

Hello Manager Xu, I am Lei Mingxuan. Regarding the recent pullback of those tech stocks in my account, I would like to schedule a phone call with you to hear your professional analysis. Would it be convenient after the National Day holiday?

【XX Automobile】Dear Mr. Lei, your scheduled test drive after the National Day holiday has been confirmed. Test drive model: Li L7, time: October 8th, 14:00-15:00, location: XX Experience Center, Pudong New Area. Please reply with T if any adjustments are needed.

Mom, I'll be at home watching the stock market and checking out cars this morning. I'd love to have some of your stewed pork rib soup for lunch. In the afternoon, I'll head out to the store and be back before dinner.
Xiao Chen, how were the passenger flow and sales data on the first day of the National Day event in the morning? I'll be at the store around 1 PM.
Brother Xuan, the foot traffic this morning was quite good, about 30% higher than usual. The new hoodies sold the best. I've compiled the data and will show it to you when you arrive.

Me: Vivi, I just finished chatting with my cousin. She recommended a few cars, and the ES6 seems pretty good. I'm driving home now. Let's have a video call later to discuss it in detail, and we can also finalize the itinerary for Suzhou.
Lin Wei: Okay, I'll wait until you get home. I just checked out some travel guides for Suzhou, and there are a few highly-rated cafes. Let’s choose together when we video chat.
Me: Did you see the official announcement on my Moments yesterday? Thank you all for your blessings. I'll treat you to a meal another day!
Me: Mom, I'll be home in about 20 minutes. I'm craving your steamed perch for dinner tonight. By the way, I bought new batteries for Dad's hearing aid, and I'll help him try them out tonight.
Zhang Wei: I've seen that VR one, it's really impressive! Next Saturday works for me, I'll adjust my shift. You decide the specific time and place, I'll follow your lead.
Mom, the pan-fried dumplings for breakfast were really delicious, thank you! I'll go to the store today to handle the loan and upgrade matters. I'll bring all the necessary documents, so don't worry.
Dad, you're right to remind me. I'll check my ID card, business license, and bank statements later, and confirm with you again before going to the bank this afternoon.

Dear Manager Xu, I am Lei Mingxuan. Regarding the financial planning for our family's home exchange, I would like to schedule a detailed discussion with you tomorrow afternoon. Would that be convenient for you? We could meet at a café near your company.

Manager Zheng, I'm Lei Mingxuan from Xuanchao. The initial draft of the store upgrade plan and the data review are basically completed, with a focus on highlighting the sales growth over the past six months and the expected returns after the renovation. I'll send them to you for review when it's convenient, and I'd appreciate your feedback.
Me: Just finished working out and am driving home. Made a lot of progress on the loan and the proposal today, but this damn stock market and rainy weather are a bit annoying. How about on your end?
Xiao Chen, I should arrive at the store around 9:20. Could you please organize the batch of work jackets that arrived yesterday? We'll work on the display together once I get there.

【Shichen Mall Property】Dear merchants: A fire drill will be held from 10:30 to 11:45 today. Please ensure that at least one person in charge from each store gathers in the atrium. During the drill, please follow the evacuation instructions. Thank you for your cooperation!
Mom, I just finished the fire drill at the mall and learned a lot. I also checked the store, and everything is safe. You and Dad don't need to worry.

Manager Zheng, I have prepared the materials for this afternoon's planning meeting. The layout diagram for the 'Urban Camping Supply Station' has also been updated. I will go over the details with you again before the meeting.

Hello Li Wei, I'm Lei Mingxuan from Urban Corner. It was a pleasure meeting you at the meeting today. Regarding the collaboration on the "Urban Camping Supply Station," our initial idea is to combine clothing, coffee, and outdoor scenes to create a limited-time themed experience zone. If it's convenient, would you like to schedule a time next week to discuss this in more detail?

Mom, Dad, I'm home. The planning meeting went exceptionally well today. My idea for an "Urban Camping Supply Station" was adopted by the mall's promotion manager. I also met the owners of a coffee shop and an outdoor gear store, and we've scheduled a follow-up meeting to discuss collaboration in detail.

Brothers, my creative idea was a huge success at the mall planning meeting today! The 'Urban Camping Supply Station' project has officially launched, and I even secured two potential partners. Feels like I'm one step closer to my dream!
【Shichen Mall Security】Dear merchant, the remote monitoring and alarm system for your store (Urban Corner) completed its self-check at 22:05:00 on October 15, 2025. Status: All normal.
Me: Mom, I've finished my run and will be home in about 20 minutes. I'd love to have your scallion oil noodles for breakfast!
Wang Xiuying: Alright, son. The noodles are already in the pot, and your dad is up too. We'll wait for you to come back and eat together.
Lei Jianguo: Mingxuan, have you brought all the loan materials? Don't be nervous, just explain things clearly to them.
Me: Dad, I've got everything packed, don't worry. I'll fill you in on the details when I get back tonight.
Me: Brother Feng, I'll arrive at the business department around 9:25. Is everything arranged with Manager Zhang?

【China Zhongjin Wealth Securities】Dear customer, your scheduled loan business interview will begin at 9:30 today. Location: Room 1104, 11th Floor, Lujiazui Ring Road Business Department. Account Manager: Manager Zhang. Please arrive on time.
Me: Hello, Manager Zhang, this is Lei Mingxuan. I have arrived downstairs at the business department and will be up shortly.
Me: Brother Tao, the payment has been transferred. Please check it. When can the sample fabric for winter clothing be shipped?
Feng Xiaoyu: Mingxuan, is the beige trench coat I liked last time still in stock? I'd like to try it on this weekend.
Me: Xiaoyu, that trench coat just sold out. But we just got in a new khaki trench coat with a similar cut and better quality. I've saved a size M for you—want to come check it out this weekend?

Zheng Kai: Mingxuan, the idea of the 'Urban Camping Supply Station' we discussed last time was well-received by the leadership. It might be used for the year-end mall promotions, and your store could collaborate on it then.
Xiao Chen, I've already closed the shop and set off. I expect to arrive at your store on Jinqiao Road around 18:40. I have all the contract documents with me. The address is XXX Jinqiao Road, right?
Dad, the contract signing went smoothly, and the deposit has been paid! I'm on the subway heading home now and should arrive around 21:10.

Yuanzi, I've compiled all the information about the attractions, transportation, and food in Kamakura and Akihabara into a document. I just sent it to the 'Anime Pilgrimage Command Center' group. Please take a look at the framework first.

I've read the document you shared—it's incredibly detailed! The information about those second-hand figure shops in Akihabara is really useful. I've added a few lesser-known pilgrimage sites and shared them in the group chat as well.
Got it! Your additional points are excellent. I'll take care of the visa and flight tickets. I'll compare the prices and visa approval rates across several platforms.
Alright, then I'll leave it to you! I'll take care of refining the accommodation and the specific daily itinerary. Let's aim to finalize the overall framework by next week.
Mom, I'm stuck in traffic and it'll probably take me another half an hour to get home. Please get ready first, and once I arrive, I'll pick you up and we can head straight to the hearing aid center.
Mom, I have a coffee sharing session at the shop tonight, and it might end late. Please go ahead and rest without waiting for me.
We're done here and heading to 'Tipsy Station'. Have you arrived yet?

Mom, I have an appointment with the financial manager this morning to discuss some matters. I'll be home for lunch at noon. In the afternoon, I'll take you to look at cars, and we'll probably leave around 12:30.
Alright son, be careful on your way, I've kept your breakfast warm for you.

Xiao Chen, please remember to scan all the utility bills (water, electricity, and gas) from the past six months. I need to submit additional materials to the bank for a loan application, and I need them this morning. Once done, please send them to me via WeChat.

【XX Bank】Dear customer, your credit card ending with 7890 has generated the current statement. The repayment date is November 5th, and the minimum payment due is 1200 yuan. If you wish to apply for installment payment, please reply with "分期".
Manager Xu, I have arrived at the KFC in the Science and Technology Museum, sitting by the window.

【Industrial and Commercial Bank of China】Dear customer, the supplementary materials for your housing loan application have been received and are currently under review. The result is expected within 3 business days. Please pay attention to SMS notifications.
contactName: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

message_content: Master He, I plan to go see an SUV this afternoon. Since you've worked on many cars, do you know if the 2.0T engine and dual-clutch transmission of that model are prone to minor issues in the long run?
Dad, Mom, I'm almost at the front door, you can come downstairs now.

Mom, the braised pork tonight was absolutely delicious! The SUV I test drove today was really great - excellent visibility and plenty of power. I feel like it's more suitable for our daily use than an MPV. What do you think?

Me: The texture is absolutely stunning, the paint finish is incredibly smooth, and the details are even better than the official photos. I’ll bring you to the store another day to show you the actual product.

Good morning, Auntie Zhu! We were in a bit of a hurry chatting at the soup dumpling restaurant earlier. I have the design renderings for the new home with me. When you have time, please come over to my place for a visit. I can show you the color swatch samples and also hear your suggestions.

Good morning, Manager Zheng. I just arrived at the store and wanted to follow up on the progress of the evaluation report for the expansion lease application. Please share the latest updates when you have a moment. Thank you.

Hello Xiaoyu. Regarding the camel-colored coat you inquired about yesterday, we still have sizes M and L in stock. Would you like me to reserve one for you? Alternatively, if you could share your height and weight, I can recommend a more suitable size for you.

Mom, I was doing a store walkthrough at the mall during lunch to get some renovation inspiration, and I saw a shop with an amazing natural wood color scheme. I took a few photos and will show them to you when I get home tonight. I think it could work well for our new living room.

Zhao Min, good afternoon. Thank you for the suggestions at noon. I took stock of the inventory this afternoon and realized we need to replenish some items with a sense of design. Could you please send me the contact information for the two designer brand founders you mentioned? I'll reach out to them tomorrow.
Mom, I'm off work now and driving back home. The traffic is a bit heavy. What's for dinner tonight?
Steamed sea bass, broccoli with minced garlic, and tomato egg soup. Drive slowly and be careful.

Lin Wei, I measured the corner of the shop. The background wall is 2.5 meters wide and 3 meters high, and we need to reserve at least three power outlets. For the lighting, I suggest using softboxes. I've sent the detailed requirements document to your email. Please check if there's anything else to add?

Okay, I've received the document, it's very detailed. I'll talk to my designer friend this afternoon to see how we can achieve the best effect. Do you have any ideas about the color of the background wall?
I think using light gray or off-white as the background is quite versatile. As for the specific color code, let's wait for your friend's suggestion. Thanks for your effort.

Brother Tao, could you send me the logistics tracking number for the winter clothes we ordered last week? I need it to arrange for the receipt of the goods. Also, when can we expect the second batch to be shipped?
Brother Kai, regarding the store expansion lease evaluation we discussed last time, has the property management team provided any preliminary results? When can we expect a definitive answer?
Fei, is the basketball event still on tonight? I should be able to get to the gym around 7.

Auntie Zhu, good morning! I was so happy to run into you during my walk just now—you look wonderful. My shop has just received a new batch of comfortable wool sweaters that are perfect for your age—warm and stylish. When you have some free time, why not drop by the shop? I’d love to show them to you and let you try them on.

Nana, good morning! I just finished breakfast, and the weather is nice today. Regarding the designer collaboration hoodie you mentioned you were looking for last time, I think my store might have a similar style. I’ll check this afternoon and send you some pictures, okay?

Shen Jie, I've just set off for the store, and the traffic is a bit heavy. Could you please resend the contact information for the cashmere supplier 'Fanghua' that you mentioned on the phone? I'd like to note down the full name and phone number.

Brother Tao, good morning! I'll probably arrive at the shop around 10:30. Regarding the batch of winter jackets we discussed last time, the logistics tracking shows they will arrive in Shanghai this afternoon. Could you please follow up on that and have them delivered directly to my shop once they arrive? Thank you!

Mom, I'm almost home, about 20 minutes away. I can smell the braised pork from downstairs already!
Dongzi, Brother Lang, the Starscourge Radahn has been slain! I've posted the screenshot in the group chat. My aim is on fire tonight—I feel like I can conquer another one!
Jingjing, do you have any extra bubble wrap and cardboard boxes left from your last move? I’m packing my figurines and books, and it feels like I don’t have enough materials.
Vivi, I've finished washing up and I'm ready for a video call. I cleared the game today and packed a lot of things—tired but happy.
Mom, I just finished reading my physical examination report. The doctor said my fatty liver has improved a lot, and all indicators are getting better. Please don’t worry.
Dad, for the celebration tonight, I should be home around 7. Have you and Mom decided what to eat? I can pick up some ready-made dishes or fruit on my way back.
Ms. Qian, the cashmere coat you tried on earlier has been packed for you, and the receipt is inside the bag. Thank you for your support. We'll notify you when new arrivals are available.
Xiao Chen, you've worked hard today! I've already locked the door here, and the settlement is complete. See you tomorrow!
Fei, I'm stuck on the overpass, probably gonna be another half hour. Is everyone there for the basketball game?

Brother Xuan, I've looked at the store design drawings you sent last time, and the color-blocking scheme is quite bold! However, I think the main color could be a bit warmer—for example, using khaki instead of gray would add more texture. What do you think?

Brother Xuan, I saw it on your Moments! That's incredible! Losing 10 pounds in a year and running so much—your determination is truly amazing! You have to sign up for a half marathon next year. I'll be there to cheer you on!

Mom, it's going to get colder tomorrow. Remember to put on an extra layer when you and Dad go out to buy groceries in the morning. I've prepared honey water for you, it's on the table.

Dad, last time you mentioned your joints were a bit uncomfortable. I bought you that knee brace, and it's arrived. I've placed it on your bedside table. You can try it out when you play basketball tomorrow.
Mom, I just got my report after the physical exam. The doctor said my fatty liver is completely cured, and all my indicators are excellent. You and Dad can rest assured.
Master He, I'll be arriving at the shop around 16:20. Regarding the tire inspection we discussed last time, would it be convenient for you to take a look today?
Viagra, my physical exam results today are surprisingly good! Fatty liver is gone! Let's catch up for a bit tonight if you're free.
Mom, I'm almost home. I'd love to have your steamed mandarin fish for dinner tonight.

Mom and Dad, I've arrived at Pudong Airport. I've just finished check-in and baggage drop-off, and everything went smoothly. I'll go through security soon, so don't worry. I'll contact you again once I arrive in Tokyo.

Today's conversation was truly inspiring! I think the collaboration path you mentioned for domestic trendy brands is highly feasible. I'll go back and organize the key points we discussed, then send you a preliminary plan next week. Could you please help take a look at the resources in Hangzhou?

Mom, I'm having breakfast at a convenience store in Akihabara, Tokyo. I got some rice balls and milk, and they taste pretty good. I'm checking the route to Ikebukuro now, planning to visit some second-hand shops. How are you and Dad doing back home?
Jiejie, I'm browsing second-hand shops in Ikebukuro and came across some really cute anime keychains. I thought I'd get one for you too. Do you prefer the style of "Demon Slayer" or "Jujutsu Kaisen"?

Dad, I've organized last month's shop turnover and the receipts for the smart home devices purchased in Japan. You can take a look when you have time.

Yuanzi, I just finished dinner on my end. Would it be convenient to have a voice call in half an hour? I have some ideas about offline space design for the younger customer segment and would like to hear your thoughts.

Gao Yuan: The ideas you just mentioned about 'offline gamified interactions' and 'theme pop-ups' are fantastic. I've noted down a few specific cases and will organize them to share with you later. Today's conversation was really inspiring—thanks, buddy!

Shen Jie: Bro, I've been thinking more about the car buying we discussed yesterday. The color scheme and interior design of the NIO ES6 are really photogenic and suit your taste. I strongly suggest you pay close attention to this model. Make sure to check out the other options as well.

I'm done playing ball. I'll be at the usual barbecue spot in about 20 minutes. Could you check if they have any low-salt options? Thanks!

message_content: Gao Yuan: Lei Mingxuan, I discovered a rare item at the Raffles City North Bund today, and I'm so excited!

Do you have any questions about the coverage details of the "Anxin Xiang Elderly Medical Insurance" and "Anxin Xiang Elderly Cancer Insurance" products?
